channel.title: Pages on Dan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Dan's blog

item.title: About
item.description: About Hi there! I’m Daniel. My IT adventure began in 2022 on the helpdesk. With a degree in Journalism to my name, my IT know-how was pretty basic – It definitely didn’t help me learn how to configure MDM policies at Uni. However, a neat little project, where I set up a Plex server on an old computer, really kick-started my learning. It’s projects like these, which I’d like to start posting on this blog, that I find the best way to learn.
